Verses: 1 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththin Jaadhigalai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Veratruppogap Pannuvadhinaal, Nee Avarkal Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkondu, Avargal Pattanangalilum Avargal Veedugalilum Kudiyerumbodhu,
2 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharikkak Kodukkum Un Dhesaththin Naduvile, Unakkaaga Moondru Pattanangalaip Piriththu Vaikkakkadavaai.
3 kolaiseydhavan Evanum Ange Odippogumbadi Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnaich Sudhandharikkappannap Pogira Un Dhesaththin Ellaiyai Nee Moondru Pangaagap Paguththu Adharku Vazhiyai Undupannakkadavaai.
4 kolaiseydhu Ange Odippoi, Uyirodirukkaththakkavan Yaarendraal: Thaan Munne Pagaiththiraadha Piranoruvanai Manadhariyaamal Kondravan Thaane.
5 oruvan Viraguvetta Matroruvanode Kaattil Poi, Maraththai Vettath Than Kaiyilirundha Kodariyai Ongumbodhu, Irumpaanadhu Kaambai Vittuk Kazhandru Matravan Mel Pattadhinaal Avan Irandhuponaal,

6 raththappazhikkaaran Than Manam Erigaiyil, Kolaiseydhavanai Vazhi Dhooramaayirukkiradhinaale Pin Thodarndhu Pidiththu, Avanaik Kondru Podaadhabadikku, Ivan Andhap Pattanangal Ondril Odippoi Uyirodiruppaanaaga; Ivan Avanai Munne Pagaikkaadhabadiyinaal, Ivanmel Saavukkaana Kutram Sumaravillai.
7 idhinimiththam Moondru Pattanangalai Unakkaagap Piriththuvaikkakkadavaai Endru Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.
8 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Anbukoorndhu, Ennaalum Avar Vazhigalil Nadappadharkaaga, Indru Naan Unakkuk Karpikkira Indha Ellaak Karpanaigalaiyum Kaikkondu Adhinbadi Seydhu,
9 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittabadiye, Avar Un Ellaiyai Visthaaramaakki, Un Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduppen Endru Sonna Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Unakkuk Koduththaal,

10 appozhudhu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Un Dhesaththil Kutramillaadha Raththam Sindhappadugiradhinaal Unmel Raththappazhi Sumaraadhabadikku, Indha Moondru Pattanangalum Allaamal Innum Moondru Pattanangalai Erpaduththakkadavaai.
11 oruvan Piranoruvanaip Pagaiththu, Avanukkup Padhivirundhu, Avanukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi, Avan Saagumbadi Avanai Adiththu, Indhap Pattanangalil Ondril Odippoyiruppaanaagil,
12 andhap Pattanaththin Mooppargal Aal Anuppi, Angeyirundhu Avanaik Konduvarumbadi Seydhu, Avan Saagumbadikku Avanai Raththappazhi Vaangugiravan Kaiyil Oppukkodukkakkadavargal.
13 un Kan Avanukku Irangavendaam; Kutramillaadha Iraththappazhiyai Isravelai Vittu Vilakkakkadavaai; Appozhudhu Nee Nandraayiruppaai.
14 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Dhesaththil Un Kaivasamaayirukkum Kaaniyaatchiyile Munnorgal Kuriththirukkira Piranudaiya Ellaiyai Otrippodaayaaga

15 oruvan Endha Akkiramaththaiyaavadhu Endhap Paavaththaiyaavadhu Seydhaan Endru Sollappattaal, Ore Saatchiyinaal Niyaayandheerkkak Koodaadhu; Irandu Moondru Saatchigaludaiya Vaakkinaale Kaariyam Nilaivarappadavendum.
16 oruvanmel Oru Kutraththaich Sumaththumbadi, Oru Poisaatchikkaaran Avanmel Saatchisolla Ezhumbinaal,
17 vazhakkaadugira Iruvarum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Akkaalaththil Irukkum Aasaariyargalukkum Niyaayaadhibadhigalukkum Munbaaga Vandhu Nirpaargalaaga.
18 appozhudhu Niyaayaadhibadhigal Nandraai Visaaranaiseyyakkadavargal; Saatchi Kallasaatchi Endrum, Than Sagodharan Mel Abaandamaaik Kutranjaatrinaan Endrum Kandaal,
19 avan Than Sagodharanukkuch Seyya Ninaiththabadiye Avanukkuch Seyyakkadaveergal; Ivvidhamaaith Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkuvaayaaga.
20 matravargalum Adhaik Kettup Bayandhu, Ini Ungalukkulle Appadippatta Theemaiyaich Seyyaadhiruppaargal.
21 un Kan Avanukku Irangavendaam; Jeevanukku Jeevan, Kannukkuk Kan, Pallukkup Pal, Kaikkuk Kai, Kaalukkuk Kaal Kodukkappadavendum.
